revisions.rev:
The '''list of Mensans''' contains [[Wikipedia:Notability (people)|notable people]] who are or who have been members of [[Mensa International]], the [[high IQ society]].
{{compactTOC}}
==A==
<!-- **NOTE** Do not add names to this list without a Reliable Source citation or else they will be reverted per WP:BLP ... see Talk page first!! -->
* [[Scott Adams]] – [[Cartoonist]], creator of [[Dilbert]]. Former member.<ref>{{cite web| last=Adams |first= Scott |title=Famous People Lists |work= Dilbert Blog | date = 2008-09-29 |accessdate= 2010-06-12 |url= http://www.dilbert.com/blog/entry/famous_people_lists/}}</ref><ref>{{cite web| last=Alexander |first= Bernie |title=Mensa: Are You Smart Enough? |work= [[AskMen.com]] |accessdate=2009-03-24 |url=http://www.askmen.com/entertainment/special_feature_60/92_special_feature.html}}</ref> *[[Simon Ambrose]] – Winner Britain's ''[[The Apprentice (UK series three)|Apprentice]]'' television show.<ref>{{cite web| last= |first= |title=Hired! Clever candidate scoops Apprentice prize ... |work= British Mensa |accessdate= 2000-08-27 |url= http://www.mensa.org.uk/cgi-bin/item.cgi?id=364&d=23&h=5&f=3}}</ref> * [[Isaac Asimov]] – Prolific author. Former Vice-president of Mensa International.<ref>{{cite book |last=Asimov |first=Isaac |author=Isaac Asimov |authorlink=Isaac Asimov |title=I, Asimov: A Memoir |publisher=[[Doubleday (publisher)|Doubleday]] |year=1994 |pages=380 |isbn=055356997X}}</ref> * [[Jean Auel]] – Author of ''[[The Clan of the Cave Bear]]''.<ref name="mensa">{{cite web |url= http://www.mensa.org/prominent-mensans |title= Prominent Mensans | work= [[Mensa International]] |accessdate= 2007-10-11}}</ref><ref name="Bulletin">{{cite journal | title = They're Accomplished, They're Famous, and They're MENSANS | journal = Mensa Bulletin | publisher = American Mensa | issn = 0025-9543 | year = 2004 | month = July | issue = 476 | pages = p. 23 }}</ref> *[[Yank Azman]] – [[Actor]], Antiques Expert<ref name="mensa canada communications">{{cite journal | title = Regular Contributors | journal = MC2 Journal of Mensa Canada | publisher = Mensa Canada | issn = 0820-4217 | year = 1990 | month = July | issue = 237 | pages = p. 27 }}</ref>
==B== <!-- **NOTE** Do not add names to this list without a Reliable Source citation or else they will be reverted per WP:BLP ... see Talk page first!! --> * [[Chino XL|Derek Keith Barbosa]] – Rapper (under pseudonym Chino XL).<ref>{{cite web| last= |first= |title=RapIndustry.com Chino XL Interview, with Sway and King Tech |work= RapIndustry.com |accessdate= 2007-10-11 |url= http://www.rapindustry.com/chino_xl.htm}}</ref> * [[Ben Best]] – President of the [[Cryonics Institute]]<ref name="mensa cryonics">{{cite news |url= http://www.cryonicssociety.org/articles_mensajournal.html |title= A Brain Is A Terrible Thing To Waste | work= [[Mensa International]] |accessdate= 2009-08-23}}</ref> * [[Richard Bolles]] – [[Self-help]] author.<ref name="mensa"/> * [[Cyril Burt]] – [[Educational psychologist]], developed [[factor analysis]] in psychological testing.<ref name="cbr">{{cite web | title=What is Mensa and what does it do? | work=Charlotte/Blue Ridge Mensa | url=http://cbrmensa.org/FamousMs/famous.html | accessdate=17 January 2011}}</ref> * [[Eileen Rose Busby]] – [[Antique]]s expert.<ref>{{cite news |url=http://www.signonsandiego.com/uniontrib/20050409/news_1m9busby.html |title=Eileen Rose Busby; writer, world traveler and antiques expert |author=Elizabeth Fitzsimons |work= [[The San Diego Union-Tribune]] |date=2005-04-09}}</ref> *[[Jacques Bergier]] – Chemical engineer, member of the [[French resistance]], spy, journalist and writer <ref name="mensa.fr">{{cite web | title=Mensa France | url=http://www.mensa.fr/_presentation_notoires.html}}</ref>

* [[Mike Carona]] – Former [[Sheriff]]-[[Coroner]] of [[Orange County, California]].<ref name="Bulletin"/> * [[Asia Carrera]] – Former [[pornography|pornographic]] [[actress]] and [[blog]]ger.<ref name="Bulletin"/> * [[Leslie Charteris]] – Writer and author of [[The Saint]] novels, featuring [[Simon Templar]].<ref name=MensaItaly>[http://www.mensa.it/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=14&Itemid=28 Cos'Ã¨ il Mensa?] Mensa Italy</ref><ref name=ContemporaryAuthors>''Contemporary Authors, New Revision Series'', Volume 58, Page 80</ref> * [[Jack Cohen (scientist)|Jack Cohen]] – Reproductive biologist and [[popular science]] writer.<ref name=Mensa>[https://secure.mensa.org.uk/download/1472/FAQs-_Apr-2008_2.pdf Mensa] Frequently Asked Questions</ref> * [[Martin Cooper (inventor)|Martin Cooper]] – Considered the inventor of the [[Mobile phone|cell phone]].<ref name="Bulletin"/> *[[Adrian Cronauer]] – Real-life inspiration for the movie ''[[Good Morning, Vietnam]]''.<ref name="mensa"/> *[[Alexander Crutchfield]] – American businessman and financier, founder of Oasis Partners.<ref name="Bulletin"/> *[[Bobby Czyz]] – [[Boxing|Boxer]], former two-time [[World Boxing Association]] Cruiserweight Champion.<ref name="mensa"/>

==O== <!-- **NOTE** Do not add names to this list without a Reliable Source citation or else they will be reverted per WP:BLP ... see Talk page first!! --> * [[Joyce Carol Oates]] – [[Author]] of ''[[The Gravedigger's Daughter]]''.<ref>{{cite web |last= Folse |first= Molly |title= The Mensans and Me: Intelligence and perception put to the test at American Mensa's Annual Gathering |work= Birmingham Weekly |date= October 25-November 1, 2007 |url= http://bhamweekly.com/article.php?article_id=00364 |accessdate=2007-11-07}}{{Dead link|date=March 2010}}</ref> * [[Adam Osborne]] â [[Computer]] designer, [[software]] publisher, created first commercially available portable computer, the [[Osborne 1]].<ref name="cbr" /> * [[Brendan O'Carroll]] – Irish [[comedian]].<ref>{{cite news |url=http://www.independent.ie/opinion/analysis/if-you-dont-score-in-the-top-2-of-the-population-youll-never-get-into-the-high-iq-society-which-celebrates-its-60th-birthday-this-year-ed-power-reports-116339.html |title=Article on 60th anniversary of Mensa |first=Ed |last=Power |work=[[Irish Independent]] |date=2006-01-07}}</ref>

==S== <!-- **NOTE** Do not add names to this list without a Reliable Source citation or else they will be reverted per WP:BLP ... see Talk page first!! --> * [[Jimmy Savile|Sir Jimmy Savile]] – English DJ, actor and television/radio personality.<ref>{{cite news |url=http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/wales/south_west/4101494.stm |title= Meeting of Mensa minds in Wales |publisher=news.bbc.co.uk |accessdate=17 September 2010 | date=17 June 2005}}</ref> * [[Norman Schwarzkopf, Jr.]] – Retired US Army General, planner of [[Operation Desert Storm]].<ref>{{cite web |title= Norman Schwarzkopf Specialty Speaker Audio Visual Tampa Florida |work= Extravaganza Productions |url= http://www.extravaganzaproductions.com/photogallery/norman.htm |accessdate=2007-11-07}}</ref> * [[Margot Seitelman]] – The first [[executive director]] of [[Mensa International|American Mensa]].<ref name=XSmart>{{cite web |url=http://www.extremelysmart.com/yankee/02k-AMLhist.php |title=American Mensa's Early Years |author=Mary W. Matthews |accessdate=2010-09-06}} (an honorary member)</ref> * [[Victor Serebriakoff]] – [[Author]] and former international president of Mensa.<ref>[http://www.mensa.org.uk/cgi-bin/item.cgi?ap=1&id=282 Obituary - Victor Serebriakoff . . . - British Mensa<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> * [[Laura Shields]] – English model and actress.<ref name=Mensa/> * [[Sir Clive Sinclair]] – [[Inventor]] of the [[Sinclair Executive]] pocket calculator, founder of [[Sinclair Research]] is a member of British Mensa, and was Chairman for 17 years from 1980 to 1997.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.mensa.org.uk/cgi-bin/item.cgi?ap=1&id=279 |title=Biography of Sir Clive Sinclair |accessdate=2007-09-25 |last=Goodenough |first=Jan |year=2000 |month=March |work=British Mensa}}</ref> * [[Scott Sonnon]] – Public speaker and celebrity fitness coach<ref name=MENSA>{{cite web |url=http://www.ag2009.us.mensa.org/AM/Template.cfm?Section=Playlist&Template=/customsource/ag2009/program_public.cfm |title=American Mensa AG 2009 Program Listing}}</ref><ref name=IYCA001>{{cite web |title= International Youth Conditioning Association Biography of Scott Sonnon |work= IYCA.org |url=http://www.iyca.org/scott-sonnon-c57.html |accessdate=2008-03-26 |archiveurl = http://web.archive.org/web/20071208021004/http://www.iyca.org/scott-sonnon-c57.html |archivedate = December 8, 2007}}</ref> * [[E.
